description: Personal relationship reminder app for staying in touch with people who matter. Set touch frequency per person, get gentle reminders, log interactions with quick notes. Mobile-first for on-the-go relationship management.
target_user: Professionals and social individuals who want to maintain relationships but forget to reach out to friends, family, and professional contacts
core_loop: Import contacts and set touch frequency (weekly/monthly/quarterly)
Receive gentle reminder when someone is due for contact
Log quick interaction note after reaching out
Adjust frequency based on actual patterns
